game.name: Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Rise of the Owlverlord
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Rise of the Owlverlord is a blistering platformer with morphing worlds, featuring seven brand new levels, a new boss and new gripping tracks from Chris Hülsbeck and Machinae Supremacy! Dash through tricky levels and transform the whole world at will in this fast-paced

reviewHighlights.text: A good old continuation of classic a classic gem It's a shame director's cut is not sold on steam tho
way shorter than the other game but still very challenging
